description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=0/3. Take on the role of MatchMaker, where you ask the Contestant and twenty Candidates questions about themselves and each other - all in hopes of finding the Contestant's "Perfect Match". With 3 different Match Levels to choose from, decide how inclusive you want to go in your efforts of finding the Perfect Match!
